column2: "Ao
column3: me man
column4: hom nyɛ aso mma me nkyerɛkyerɛ: Hom nkyɛn hom aso mma m'anomu nsɛm."

column2: "Mubobue m'ano wɔ mbɛbu mu; Mebɛka tsetsesɛm a no mu yɛ sum:"
"Dza yɛatse na yeehu
column3: Na hɛn egyanom aka akyerɛ hɛn no."

column2: "Yɛremmfa nnsuma hɛn mba
column3: Yɛreka EWURADZE ayɛyisɛm kyerɛ nkyirmba
column5: na n'anwanwa dwuma a ɔayɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔdze mbrasɛm etsintsim wɔ Jakob mu
column3: Na ɔahyɛ mbra wɔ Israel mu
column5: Dɛ wɔmma hɔn mba nhu no:"

column2: "Ama nkyirmba eehu
column3: mekyerɛ mba a wɔbɔwo hɔn no
column4: Hɔn na wɔbɔsoɛr na wɔaka akyerɛ hɔn mba:"

column2: "Ma wɔdze hɔn enyidado ato Nyankopɔn do
column3: Na hɔn werɛ emmfir Nyankopɔn no ndwuma no
column4: Na mbom woedzi ne mbrasɛm do."

column2: "Na wɔannyɛ dɛ hɔn egyanom
column3: Mbasantsen asoɔdzenfo na etuatsewfo; Mbasantsen a wɔmmfa hɔn akoma nnsi dza ɔtsen do
column4: Na hɔn sunsum nntsintsim wɔ Nyankopɔn afamu no."

column2: "Efraim mba a woemia kurakura egyen no
column3: Wɔdaan hɔn ekyir wɔ nkoda no mu;"

column2: "Osiandɛ woenndzi Nyankopɔn n'ahyɛmu no do
column3: Na wɔpoow dɛ wɔbɛnantsew ne mbra mu."

column2: "Hɔn werɛ fiir ne ndzeyɛɛ
column3: Na n'anwanwa ndwuma a ɔdze kyerɛɛ hɔn no."

column2: "Ahobowdze na ɔyɛɛ no wɔ hɔn egyanom enyim
column3: Wɔ Egypt asaase do

column2: "Ɔpaa po mu
column3: na ɔdze hɔn twaa mu; Na ɔmaa esu no gyinaa dɛ kuw."

column2: "Ɔdze mununkum gyaa hɔn kwan adzekyee so
column3: Na adzesaa nyinara ɔdze ogya kandzea."

column2: "Ɔpaapaa abotan mu wɔ sar no do
column3: Na ɔmaa wɔnoom nsu mee dɛ ofi ebun mu."

column2: "Ɔdze nsutsen so fii ɔbotan mu bae
column3: Na ɔmaa nsu peem dɛ esutsen."

column2: "Naaso wɔkɔr do araa yɛɛ bɔn tsiaa no
column3: Wɔtseew Ɔsorsornyi no do etua wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na wɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn hwɛe wɔ hɔn akoma mu Dɛ wobisaa edziban maa hɔn akɔndɔ ntsi."
"Nyew
column3: wɔkasae tsiaa Nyankopɔn; Wɔsee dɛ
column4: Aso Nyankopɔn botum ato pon wɔ sar do?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan ma nsu tuei
column4: Na nsutsen pemee; Aso obotum ama boodoo so? Aso obenya nam ama ne man?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE tsee
column3: na onyaa ebufuw: Na gya sɔe wɔ Jakob do
column4: Na ebufuw so soɛree tsiaa Israel:"

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔanngye Nyankopɔn enndzi
column3: Na wɔammfa hɔn werɛ anntwer no nkwagye."

column2: "Naaso ɔhyɛɛ wimu wɔ sor
column3: Na obuebuee ɔsor mbobow no;"

column2: "Na ɔtɔr  manna   guu hɔn do dɛ wondzi
column3: Na ɔdze sor eburow bi maa hɔn."

column2: "Nyimpa dzii akatakyi edziban: Ɔmaa hɔn edziban ma wɔmee."
"Ɔmaa boka mframa bɔɔ wɔ sor: Na ɔdze no tum gyaa pomu mframa kwan."
"Ɔtɔr nam so guu hɔn do dɛ huntuma
column3: Na ntɛkyerɛbowa dɛ mpoano anhwea:"

column2: "Na ɔmaa ɔtɔree wɔ hɔn nsera no mu
column3: Dze twaa hɔn tsenabea ho hyiae."

column2: "Nna wodzidzii mee ara yie; Na ɔmaa hɔn dza hɔn kɔn dɔe."
"Hɔn akɔndɔ nnyae nngyaae
column3: Na hɔn edziban da ho da hɔn anomu no
column6: Na okunkum hɔn mu abran no mu bi
column7: Na ɔbobɔɔ Israel mberantsɛ no hwehwee famu."

column2: "Iyi nyinara mu no mpo nna wɔda ho yɛ bɔn
column3: Na wɔanngye n'anwanwa dwuma no enndzi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔmaa hɔn nda sae wɔ egyangyandze mu
column3: Na hɔn mfe wɔ ehuyidze mu."

column2: "Aber a okunkum hɔn no
column3: nna wɔhwehwɛɛ n'ekyir kwan: Na wɔsanee hwehwɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyiberdo."

column2: "Na wɔkaa dɛ Nyankopɔn yɛ hɔn botan
column3: Na Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn no yɛ hɔn pomfo."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn ano dzɛfɛdzɛfɛɛw no
column3: Na wɔdze hɔn tɛkyerɛma dzii ator kyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na hɔn akoma enntsim wɔ no ho
column3: Nkyii so woenndzi nokwar wɔ n'ahyɛmu no mu."

column2: "Naaso
column3: ɔnodze
column7: mber pii na ɔdaan n'ebufuw kɔree

column2: "Na ɔkaa dɛ wɔyɛ honam ara; Mframa a ɔbɔ kɔ
column3: na ɔnnsan mmba bio."

column2: "Mpɛn ahen ara na wɔanntsew no do etua wɔ sar no do
column3: Na wɔannhow no werɛ wɔ asaase kwawee no do!"

column2: "Na wɔsaan bio bɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn hwɛe
column3: Na woyii Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ehi."

column2: "Wɔannkaa no tum
column3: Eso da a ɔgyee hɔn fii hɔn atamfo nsamu no."

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ Egypt
column3: Na n'anwanwadze wɔ Zoan mfuwa mu;"

column2: "Na ɔdaan hɔn esutsen bɔgya
column3: Na hɔn nsupemee

column2: "Ɔsomaa atsɛn pii wɔ hɔn mu
column3: ma wɔbɔwee hɔn; Na ntwɛr

column2: "Ɔdze hɔn ndɔbaa so maa nkonyinko
column3: Na hɔn edwumadze maa mbɛbɛw."

column2: "Ɔdze ɔsorbo kum hɔn wenyinndua
column3: Na ɔdze nsukyenkyenee bɔɔ hɔn ankye ndua."

column2: "Ɔdze hɔn anyɛmbowa so maa ɔsorbo no
column3: Na hɔn mbowakuw maa asenamambo hyew."

column2: "Ɔtoow n'ebufuw ne hyeehyew no guu hɔn do
column3: Ebufuw
column6: Dɛ abɔfo bɔn a wɔsɛɛ adze."

column2: "Ɔbɔɔ kwan maa n'ebufuw; Ɔammfa hɔn kra annkam owu
column3: Na oyii hɔn maa owuyarba;"

column2: "Na okum Egypt mbakan nyinara
column3: Hɔn ahoɔdzen ahyɛse wɔ Ham n'asesee mu:"

column2: "Na ogyaa nankasa ne man dɛ nguan
column3: Na ɔkaa hɔn wɔ sar no do dɛ mbowakuw."

column2: "Na ogyaa hɔn dwudwoodwo kɔree
column3: ma woennsuro hwee: Na hɔn atamfo dze

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn baa ne he krɔnkrɔn no do
column3: Bepɔw yi a ne nsa enyimfa tɔe no do."

column2: "Ɔpaam amanaman so wɔ hɔn enyim
column3: Na ɔdze ahoma kyɛe maa hɔn dɛ egyapadze
column4: Na ɔmaa Israel mbusuakuw tsenatsenaa hɔn asesee mu."

column2: "Naaso wɔsɔɔ Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn hwɛe na wɔtseew no do etua
column3: Na woenndzi mbrasɛm do;"

column2: "Mbom wɔsaan ekyir
column3: na wotwaa nkontompɔ dɛ hɔn egyanom: Wɔdaan hɔn faa nkyɛn dɛ egyen daadaafo."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn sorɔnsorɔmbea yii no ehi
column3: Na wɔdze hɔn ehonyi a woegu yii no nyinkun."

column2: "Nyankopɔn tsee iyi no
column3: no bo fuwii
column4: Na Israel he yɛɛ no nkɔw koraa:"

column2: "Ma ntsi ɔdaan Siloh ntamadan gyaae
column3: Asese no a osii no wɔ nyimpa mu no;"

column2: "Na oyii n'ahoɔdzen hyɛɛ ndɔmmum nsa
column3: Na n'enyimnyam hyɛɛ ɔtamfo no nsa."

column2: "Ogyaa ne man maa afona so; Na no bo fuuw n'egyapadze."
"Ogya hyeew hɔn mberantsɛ; Na hɔn mbabaawa ennya ayeforhyia ndwom."
"Hɔn asɔfoe totɔr afona ano; Na hɔn ekunafo enntwa sukwadwom."
"Nna EWURADZE nyaan dɛ obi a ofi nda mu
column3: Dɛ ɔkatakyi a nsa ama oruhuro."

column2: "Na ɔbobɔɔ n'atamfo no korakora nkyirnkyir no: Ɔbɔɔ hɔn sɛɛ hɔn daa."
"Bio so ɔpoow Josef n'asesee
column3: Na ɔannsan mu ennyi Efraim ebusuakuw
column6: Bepɔw Zion a ɔpɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na osii no krɔnkrɔnbea dɛ ɔsor
column3: Dɛ asaase a ɔdze etsim hɔ daa no."

column2: "Ɔsaan mu yii n'akowaa David so
column3: Na oyii no fii nguamban no mu:"

column2: "Ɔdze no fii nguamber a wɔma enumfo hɔn ekyirdzi bae
column3: Dɛ ɔmbɛnyɛn ne man Jakob

column2: "Nna ɔnyɛɛn hɔn dɛ mbrɛ n'akoma mu nokwardzi tse; Na ɔnam ne nsa nyimdzee do gyaa hɔn kwan."
